title: "Squeee (ba ba bada bo)" - Nandi and the Scat Man
itunes:title: "Squeee (ba ba bada bo)" - Nandi and the Scat Man
description:
Fossa Prince of the Scat Clan, Rraaaabu.bud.um is journeying beyond his island in search of the Ancient Forefossas, instead, he meets the most adorable Dassie drummer the world has ever seen. Jeremy is our Dungeon Master in today's setting inspired by Mozambique and the medieval Kingdom of Zimbabwe. 


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
